DOC.brief_summary: Is postoperative IUI better than expectant management in infertile endometriosis patients with good prognosis based on their EFI score? (A single centre randomised controlled trial).
DOC.brief_title: Immediate IUI Versus Expectant Management in Postoperative Endometriosis Patients
DOC.criteria: recent (<6months) complete laparoscopic endometriosis resection endometriosis fertility index (EFI) at least 7/10 Regular menstrual cycles (min 24days max 38days) with proven ovulation At least one functional tube at surgery, normal uterus Sperm sample of partner: normal or mild male factor frozen (donor or partner) sperm clinical and/or imaging evidence of endometriosis recurrence/persistence at randomization FSH > 20 IU/L
